org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master

接口 AssignmentListener


  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface AssignmentListener
    Get notification of assignment events. The invocations are inline so make sure your implementation is fast else you'll slow hbase.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void regionClosed(RegionInfo regionInfo)
      The region was closed on the region server.
      void regionOpened(RegionInfo regionInfo, ServerName serverName)
      The region was opened on the specified server.

    • 方法详细资料

      • regionOpened

        void regionOpened(RegionInfo regionInfo,
                  ServerName serverName)
        The region was opened on the specified server.
        参数:
        regionInfo - The opened region.
        serverName - The remote servers name.

      • regionClosed

        void regionClosed(RegionInfo regionInfo)
        The region was closed on the region server.
        参数:
        regionInfo - The closed region.
